item.title: Contact
item.description: The most efficient way to contact us if thorugh e-mail at info@vufuzi.se. I you wanna call us, dial to +46 72-503 91 48.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Web and App Development WeÂ´re flexible in our pricing. For web development we charge 400 SEK (exclusive VAT) per hour. Fixed prices can be arranged as well, starting from 5 000 SEK. Website Hosting Our environmental friendly hosting solution is 100 SEK per month exclusive VAT. Website Maintenance Keeping a website updated and compliant to the latest standars is important for both you and your users. We offer maintenance for 300 SEK / month, VAT excluded.

item.title: Services
item.description: Web Development We craft simple, yet beautiful websites with modern techniques and the latest code standards. If you wish to have a CMS, Content Management System, that can be arranged. We always do Search Engine Optimization (SEO). baked into our products! Web Hosting When you buy any of our services you will get the oppotunitto let us host your website with our environmental friendly web hosting. All energy used to power the servers are generated by wind energy.
